Package command

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ICommand
    The command interface that commands must implement.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Command
    Base class for all chainable commands.
    CommandFactory
    Factory class which creates commands.
    CommandListener
    Simple ActionListener that executes an ICommand upon activation
    GameLoopEnabledCommand
    Starts and stops the game-loop.
    LoadNextLevelCommand
    Tells the FlowController to load the next level.
    SetDifficultyCommand
    Sets the Difficulty on the MainModel.
    SetPlayerNameCommand
    Sets the player's name on the MainModel.
    SetViewStateCommand
    Command to change the top-level view state
    StartNewGameCommand
    Starts a new game-session (for the same player) by calling the FlowController
    SubmitHighscoreCommand
    Submits a highscore to our server.
    UpdateGameStateCommand
    Tells the GameController to update it's current GameState.
